mapper.delete: DELETE FROM rookie.Stock_Price WHERE STOCK_DATE < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 100 MINUTE);
mapper.select: SELECT CAST(AVG(STOCK_PRICE) AS UNSIGNED) as avg_STOCK_PRICE FROM (SELECT sp.STOCK_PRICE FROM rookie.Stock_Price sp ORDER BY sp.STOCK_DATE DESC LIMIT 60 OFFSET #{param}) as mindata;
